actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to correct certain inequities in the crediting of National Guard technician service in connection with civil service retirement.

summary.text: Removes specified period-of-service limitations in the crediting of National Guard technician service in connection with civil service retirement. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8332, 8334, 8339, 83340).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to correct certain inequities in the crediting of National Guard technician service in connection with civil service retirement.
